channel.title: Ngc7023 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights
channel.description: Recent content in Ngc7023 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights

item.title: The Iris Nebula
item.description: The Iris Nebula NGC 7023 looks like a celestial blossom. It is a bright reflection nebula whose trademark glowing blue color results from the scattered light of its central star.
